channel.title: Math + More on Carson Connard
channel.description: Recent content in Math + More on Carson Connard

item.title: Techno
item.description: Amongst all genres that I listen to, I am the most interested in techno, including its history and evolution as it spread from its origin in Detroit, over to Germany, Belgium, and the Netherlands, and back to the US and other regions in Europe and the world. I spend a lot of my time searching for and collecting techno (both in digital and physical form), and every once in a while I play around with a controller for fun.

item.title: Photo Gallery
item.description: Travelling (particularly for math) has brought me to some cool places, and introduced me to even cooler people. Here are some pictures from (some of) my wanderings.

item.title: Things I've been thinking about recently
item.description: A place for me to talk about some of my recent mathematical musings.

item.title: Talks & Travel
item.description: I have presented my work at various conferences, seminars, and workshops. This is a list of my talks and math-related travels.

item.title: Papers
item.description: A list of my papers and expository writings.
